product_name: Sunday Afternoons Fun Bucket Hat - Kids'
long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Fun Bucket hat offers young noggins cute and comfortable protection from the sun for hours of outdoor fun. 2.5-in. brim slopes down to shield the eyes and skin. Water-resistant nylon provides UPF 50+ protection, holding the sun's harmful rays at bay. Mesh panel encircles crown for moisture release and air circulation. The Sunday Afternoons Fun Bucket hat features a breakaway chin strap with an adjustable cordlock.
short_description: The Sunday Afternoons Fun Bucket hat offers young noggins cute and comfortable protection from the sun for hours of outdoor fun.
